Dgame.Window.Window



class Window;
Window is a rendering window where all drawable objects are drawn.

Note that the default clear-color is Color.White and the default Sync is Window.Sync.Enable.

Author:
rschuett

enum Sync;
The Window syncronisation mode. Default Syncronisation is Sync.Enable.

Enable
Sync is enabled.

Disable
Sync is disabled.

None
Unknown State.

const VideoMode vMode;
Window VideoMode's

final this(VideoMode vMode);
CTor

final this(VideoMode vMode, string title);
CTor

final this(VideoMode vMode, short x, short y, string title = DefaultTitle);
CTor

final void close();
Close and destroy this window.

static uint count();
Returns how many windows exist

final @property uint id();
Every window has an unique Id. This method returns this Id.

final const void setVerticalSync(Sync sync);
Set the Syncronisation mode of this window. Default Syncronisation is Sync.Enable.

See:
Sync enum

final const Sync getVerticalSync();
Returns the current syncronisation mode.

See:
Sync enum

final const Image capture(Texture.Format fmt = Texture.Format.BGRA);
Capture the pixel data of the current window and returns an Image with this pixel data. You can also alter the format of the pixel data. Default is Texture.Format.BGRA. This method is predestinated for screenshots.

Example:
Window wnd = ...
...
wnd.capture().saveToFile("samples/img/screenshot.png");


final const bool hasKeyboardFocus();
Returns if the keyboard focus is on this window.

final const bool hasMouseFocus();
Returns if the mouse focus is on this window.

final ref Clock getClock();
Returns the window clock. You can freeze the application or get the current framerate.

See:
Dgame.System.Clock

final void setFpsLimit(ubyte fps);
Set the framerate limit for this window.

final const pure nothrow ubyte getFpsLimit();
Returns the framerate limit for this window.

final const pure nothrow @property bool isOpen();
Check if this window is still opened.

final void initClearColor();
Init the current clear color.

final void setClearColor(ref const Color col);
Set the color with which this windows clear his buffer. This is also the background color of the window.

final void setClearColor(const Color col);
Rvalue version

final void setClearColor(float red, float green, float blue, float alpha = 0.000000);
Set the color with which this windows clear his buffer. This is also the background color of the window.

final const pure nothrow ref const(Color) getClearColor();
Returns the current clear color.

final const void clear();
Clears the buffer.

final void draw(Drawable draw);
Draw a drawable object on screen.

final void draw(ref RenderTarget rtarget);
Draw a Render Target on screen.

final void display();
Make all changes visible on screen. If the framerate limit is not 0, it waits for (1000 / framerate limit) milliseconds.

final Vector2s getPosition();
Returns the current position of the window.

final void setPosition(short x, short y);
Set a new position to this window

final void setPosition(ref const Vector2s vec);
Set a new position to this window

final void fetchPosition(int* x, int* y);
Fetch the current position if this window. The position is stored inside of the pointer. The pointer don't have to be null.

final const pure nothrow string getTitle();
Returns the current title of the window.

final string setTitle(string title);
Set a new title to this window

Returns:
the old title

final const pure nothrow @property ushort width();
Returns the width.

final const pure nothrow @property ushort height();
Returns the height.

final void setSize(ushort width, ushort height);
Set a new size to this window if width or height is zero, the old width/height is used.

final void raise();
Raise the window. The window has after this call focus.

final void restore();
Restore the window.

final void setScreenSaver(bool enable);
Enable or Disable the screen saver.

final const bool isScreenSaverEnabled();
Returns if the screen saver is currently enabled, or not.

final void show(bool show);
Show or hide the window. true shows, false hides.

final void setFullscreen(bool enable);
Enable or disable Fullscreen mode.

final const pure nothrow bool isFullscreen();
Check whether this Window is currently windowed, or not.

final void setIcon(ref Surface icon);
Set an icon for this window.
